name: Saranya Saravanan

projects.name: Contact Manager
projects.detail: This is a MERN stack web application where users can manage their contacts. Each user can have their own login and can perform operations such as adding, editing or deleting contact details. It uses JWT strategy for privacy, encryption with salt for password protection. The backend API developed using Express, Nodesjs with Javascript input validation and Mongodb in Atlas cloud as data store. Responsive frontend designed using React, Redux and css for styles and customization. Deployed the application in Heroku server.

projects.name: GitHub Finder Application
projects.detail: Web application that performs search and fetch the GitHub profile of users and display only the specified fields from the entire profile details and their repositories. Third-party GitHub API is used for accessing the data. Used React Hooks and Context API for frontend and deployed the application to the Netlify server.

projects.name: English Alphabets Game
projects.detail: This game developed in ReactJS for kids to learn English alphabets and the words for corresponding alphabets. Game also has audio for easy learning. The audio and the visual are synchronized using functions to get more gaming experience with learning. Deployed the game in Heroku server.

projects.name: Big data processing and Predictive Analysis
projects.detail: Implementing text processing and supervised machine learning algorithm on a  large dataset using MapReduce in Hadoop. Using Spark Libraries to implement an end to end Predictive Analytics Pipeline. Created a machine learning model for predicting the genre of the movie given the movie id, multi label classification. Using  (TF-IDF)  based and custom feature engineering  technique to improve the performance of the model.

projects.name: End to end Information Retrieval model
projects.detail: The IR solution for data ingestion of twitter data, performs click based search for retrieving tweets and also provides analytic visualizations. Analytics implemented using Python and the hidden insights of the retrieved data is implemented using the Google charts library in React framework.
